name: vending_machine_of_emotions
prompt: In malls, vending machines now dispense feelings instead of drinks. Write a scene where someone buys 'forgiveness' but gets 'jealousy' instead.
decoded: I walked up to the vending machine and selected 'forgiveness' from the list. The machine whirred and a can of 'jealousy' was dispensed. I stared at it in shock, wondering if I had made a mistake. I didn't want to feel jealous, I wanted forgiveness.
